org.web3j.crypto

Class SecureRandomUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.web3j.crypto.SecureRandomUtils

  • final class SecureRandomUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for working with SecureRandom implementation.

    This is to address issues with SecureRandom on Android. For more information, refer to the following issue.
